data.name: eBay VR Department Store
data.description:
The eBay Virtual Reality Department Store allows you to browse, select and purchase Myer products in a whole new way. 
1. Personalise: you can select your interests at the beginning of the experience and then the store is custom built around your needs and passion points, making the most relevant products visible first. As you move through the store, the smart technology learns about your selections and suggests other products that might interest you.
2. Browse: via the creation of eBay Sight Searchâ„¢, you can view a product in the store and then by holding your gaze on it, the product floats towards you. You are able quickly accelerate through different departments of the store, making the shopping experience much more efficient.
3. Research: you can simply lock eyes on the information icons to receive full product specifications, as well as price, availability and shipping details.
4. Purchase: just hold your eyes on the Add to Basket icon to buy and check out via the eBay platform.
